mapinfo.detailsText: Conquer the pits of Erebus, where lost relics are guarded by Shades of the dead. Your Villagers start scattered with no Town Center, and must race to claim a Settlement during the time that combat is prevented. Resource placement has greater randomization.
mapinfo.loadDetailsText: Conquer the pits of Erebus, where lost relics are guarded by Shades of the dead. Your Villagers start scattered with no Town Center, and must race to claim a Settlement during the time that combat is prevented. Resource placement has greater randomization, will you choose an easily defensible location or one near many resources?
